messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3405
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/1/03 4:35:32 PM, sjogy@sbcglobal.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/1/03 4:35:32 PM, sjogy@... writes:

<< Stand By Me. Also directed by Rob Reiner, from Stephen King's short story.
>>

But I learned from the special features on the DVD that he changed the main
protagonist some. The scene with the gun was transferred from one character
to another.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3405
messages.msgSnippet: on 5/1/03 12:50 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Stand By Me. Also directed by Rob Reiner, from Stephen King s short story. Oh, and Carrie. And
messages.messageBody:
on 5/1/03 12:50 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Can we start a list of GOOD
>
> adaptations??

Stand By Me. Also directed by Rob Reiner, from Stephen King's short story.

Oh, and Carrie. And The Shining. NOT "It."

Holes.

Jaws (one of the few that's better than the book).

Paula, still thinking.......
